snippet: A student group, alleging that Facebook continues to violate Europe’s data protection laws, said it planned to appeal an Irish regulator’s settlement with the company.
abstract: Austrian student group, which calls itself Europe vs Facebook, says it plans to challenge Facebook's privacy policies in Irish court, saying it failed to adapt to restrictions of European data protection law despite repeated requests and formal complaints by its members.
lead_paragraph: A student group, alleging that Facebook continues to violate Europe’s data protection laws, said it planned to appeal an Irish regulator’s settlement with the company.

headline.main: Law Students in Austria Challenge Facebook Privacy Policy
headline.print_headline: Law Students in Austria Challenge Facebook Policy
